trends: There have been 4 other sightings in La Habra
There were no other sightings in La Habra on or around June 8th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was washing down my driveway.it was just getting dark and something bright in the western sky cought my eye.it was about 1\4 of an inch in diameter.it was hard to know its real size because i did not know how far away it was.i observed it for approx. 60 sec.i thought it was an airplane at first.i have seen airplanes travel the distance it traveled and it took approx.60 sec..i the object i saw traveled the same distance in a aplit second. it made several changes of direction 180 and 90 degree turns without slowing down.it looked like a big star. it was blinking blue,green and white.my neighbor was takeing grocerys out of the trunk of her car.and i drew her attention to what i was seeing.she saw what i was seeing too.then it disapeared into some dark clouds.i used to be a skeptic about ufo's.but i know their is nothing of this earth that can do what that thing did.
Summary: bright light in western sky traveling at high speed.makeing 180 and 90 degree changes in direction without slowing down
